Description: Etihad Atheeb Telecommunication Co (known as: Atheeb Telecom) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since March 2009. Atheeb Telecom operates within the Telecommunication Services sector focusing on Integrated Telecommunication Services. Atheeb Telecom is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in February 2009.
